# Beckhoff.TwinCAT.HMI.ScopeControl

This package provides scope control components for TwinCAT HMI applications, enabling visualization and analysis of signal trends and data.

## Usage

Add `Beckhoff.TwinCAT.HMI.ScopeControl` to your TwinCAT HMI project to display and interact with scope charts within your HMI interface.

## Documentation

For detailed usage and configuration, refer to the [Beckhoff TwinCAT HMI documentation](https://infosys.beckhoff.de/content/1033/te2000_tc3_hmi_engineering/index.html).
